description: The ocean waters near Secon Island where the Straw Hats, Neo Marines, and Vice Admiral Momonga's forces engaged in battle during the rescue of Panz Fry.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Zoro vs Shuzo and Momonga
keyEvents.description: The battle between Luffy, Zoro, Shuzo, and Vice Admiral Momonga takes place in these waters.
keyEvents.significance: Setting for the escape operation and major combat.

keyEvents.title: Shuzo Defeats Momonga
keyEvents.description: Shuzo defeats Vice Admiral Momonga and his Marine forces in these waters.

description: A rocky area where the Straw Hats landed after using Coup de Burst to escape. The location provided temporary safety for the crew to regroup and for Chopper to treat Panz Fry's injuries.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Land on Rocky Area
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny and crew land safely in this rocky area after their Coup de Burst escape.
keyEvents.significance: Provides temporary safety for recovery and planning.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Treats Panz Fry
keyEvents.description: Chopper provides medical treatment to Panz Fry in this safe location.
keyEvents.significance: Safe haven allowing for recovery before the next confrontation.

statusHistory.reason: Temporary refuge for the Straw Hats

description: The base of operations for Z's Neo Marines, shown in flashback where Shuzo and Ain fought their five-hour battle for the position of second-in-command.

keyEvents.title: Shuzo vs Ain Five-Hour Battle
keyEvents.description: The location where Shuzo and Ain fought for five hours to determine Z's second-in-command.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the Neo Marine hierarchy and power structure.

keyEvents.title: Ain's Modo Modo no Mi Demonstration
keyEvents.description: Location where Ain demonstrated her Devil Fruit power by reverting ground to magma.
keyEvents.significance: First demonstration of Modo Modo no Mi abilities in the TV anime.

statusHistory.reason: Active military base for Neo Marines

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' ship, used in this episode to execute a Coup de Burst escape maneuver with Panz Fry and Lily aboard.

keyEvents.title: Coup de Burst Escape
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny executes a Coup de Burst maneuver using a thrust-up stream to escape with Panz Fry and Lily.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the ship's special capabilities in critical situations.
